This is the home for the book ``Bayesian Learning - a gentle introduction``, which is still work in progress. 
The book is currently used for the course [Bayesian Learning](https://github.com/mattiasvillani/BayesLearnCourse) at Stockholm University.

A [pdf](pdf/BayesBook.pdf) of the book will always be available, even after the book gets published.

The [notebooks](notebooks.qmd) tab contains notebooks for the chapters in the book.

### Contents
1. The Bayesics
2. Single-parameter models
3. Multi-parameter models
4. Priors
5. Regression
6. Prediction and Decision making
7. Normal posterior approximation
8. Classification
9. Posterior simulation
10. Variational inference
11. Regularization
12. Model comparison
13. Variable selection
14. Gaussian processes
15. Interaction models
16. Mixture models
17. Dynamic models and sequential inference\
Appendix: Some Mathematical results
